document.masterDocTitle: Torrenticolid water mites (Acari: Hydrachnidia: Torrenticolidae) from Ghana

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Torrenticolid water mites (Acari: Hydrachnidia: Torrenticolidae) from Ghana

subSubSection.paragraph:
New records . Ghana : stream Asukuma, Kakum NP, 5 º
26.995 N
, 1 º
25.071 W
, alt. 131 m asl.,
12 .ii. 2013
Smit 1 / 2 [
1 juvenile
]/0 ( 1 / 1 /0 mounted).

Measurements. Male—Idiosoma (ventral view:
Figs. 18 A
,
26 B
) L 483 , W 378 ; dorsal shield (
Figs. 18 B
,
25 A
) L 426 , W 332 , L/W ratio 1.28 ; dorsal plate L 391 ; shoulder platelets L 153 , W 54 , L/W ratio 2.8 ; frontal platelets L 88 , W 62–63 , L/W ratio 1.4 ; shoulder/frontal platelets L ratio 1.74 . Gnathosomal bay L 86 , Cx-I total L 197 , Cx-I mL 112 , Cx-II+III mL 70 ; ratio Cx-I L/Cx-II+III mL 2.8 ; Cx-I mL/Cx-II+III mL 1.6 . Genital field L/W 97 / 94 , ratio 1.03 ; ejaculatory complex L 150 ; distance genital field-excretory pore 91 , genital field-caudal idiosoma margin 114 . Gnathosoma vL 85 ; chelicera total L 109 ; palp total L 154 , dL/H, dL/H ratio: P-1, 17/ 17 , 1.0; P-2, 39/ 28–29 , 1.35 ; P-3, 30/ 23 , 1.3 ; P-4, 43/ 14 [maximum 20 ], 3.1 [ 2.1 ]; P-5, 25/ 8 , 3.2 ; P- 2 /P- 4 ratio 0.89 ; dL of I-L- 2–6 : 43, 52, 55, 54, 62 – 62 ; I-L- 6 H 26 , dL/H I-L- 6 ratio 2.35 .

Female—Idiosoma (ventral view:
Figs. 18 C
,
26 C
) L 547 , W 413 ; dorsal shield (
Fig. 25 C
) L 453 , W 362 , L/W ratio 1.25 ; dorsal plate L 422 ; shoulder platelets L 145–148 , W 50–52 , L/W ratio 2.88–2.91 ; frontal platelets L 78–81 , W 53 , L/W ratio 1.47–1.53 ; shoulder/frontal platelets L ratio 1.8–1.9 . Gnathosomal bay L 78 , Cx-I total L 184 , Cx-I mL 106 , Cx-II+III mL 65 ; ratio Cx-I L/Cx-II+III mL 2.8 ; Cx-I mL/Cx-II+III mL 1.6 . Genital field L/W 117 / 122 , ratio 0.96 ; distance genital field-excretory pore 134 , genital field-caudal idiosoma margin 148 . Gnathosoma vL 99 ; chelicera total L 119 ; palp total L 155 , dL/H, dL/H ratio: P-1, 19/ 18–19 , 1.0; P-2, 39/ 28 , 1.4 ; P-3, 31/ 21–22 , 1.43 ; P-4, 43/ 14 , 3.1 ; P-5, 23/ 7 , 3.2 ; P- 2 /P- 4 ratio 0.91 ; dL of I-L- 2–6 : 41, 53, 58, 57, 64 ; I-L- 6 H 25 , dL/H I-L- 6 ratio 2.61 .

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 18A–E.
Monatractides convexiscutata (K. Viets, 1958)
, stream Asukuma (A–B, D = male, C, E = female): A, C = idiosoma, ventral view; B = dorsal shield; D–E = frontal margin of idiosoma, dorsal view. Scale bar = 100 Μm.

FIGURE 19A–E.
Monatractides convexiscutata (K. Viets, 1958)
, stream Asukuma (A–B, D = male, C, E = female): A = palp, lateral view; B = palp, medial view (P-1 lacking); C = I-L-5 and -6; D = ejaculatory complex; E = gnathosoma. Scale bar = 100 Μm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks. The specimens from stream Asukuma agree well in general morphology with
Monatractides convexiscutata (
K. Viets, 1958
)
, a species originally described from Cameroon (
K. Viets 1958
), and later on reported by
Cook ( 1966 )
from Liberia .
